gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve the current UI modifications applied to my Jira instance so that I can review and manage them effectively.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all UI modifications, including their IDs, types, and statuses.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to create a new UI modification to enhance the user experience for my team, ensuring that it aligns with our branding.
gold.ideal: The API should accept the modification details and return the created modification's ID and confirmation of success.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to delete a specific UI modification that is no longer needed to keep the interface clean and user-friendly.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified UI modification and return a success message.

gold.user: As a UX designer, I want to update an existing UI modification to improve its functionality based on user feedback.
gold.ideal: The API should accept the updated details and return the modified UI modification's ID along with a success confirmation.
